review: I purchased as gift for y brother and his wife. In order to save money they were getting rid of cable, but since they don't have home theatre pc they figured they would have to watch everything through XBOX. getting them this has allowed them to watch their shows in room if kids want to play games or watch childrens shows in TV room. They loved the control from phone and were simply amazed it worked because they had cabled their laptop to tv in past but hated the quality. They are not tech savvy but were able to set up while I was there without my aid.I would recommend to anyone, because of functionality and ease of use and set-up. I own a roku and I believe this is better and easier to use; but I do acknowledge roku has more experience at this point. This one is so easy to use I plan to get one for my mother to replace her roku which drives her nuts using Netflix and other services like Prime and Hulu. Great product Google! Great delivery time Amazon!
